title: Chloe Valdary Founder of the Theory of Enchantment discusses the Hero's Journey and the Great Father
description:
Chloe and I discuss the Great Father from the Maps of Meaning and the hero’s journey.

Her website is https://theoryofenchantment.com.
Course available at:  https://theory-of-enchantment.teachable.com

Timestamps:
0:00  Chloe Valdary discusses her background and her creation of The Theory of Enchantment training course. 
3:45  How do you teach people to love? 
4:30  Developing the Theory of Enchantment
7:25  Question re the Hero's Journey
7:55  Jordan Peterson
9:20. Having a sense of wonder (trusting the good)
11:45 Confronting the sense of one's own existence (mortality)
13:30 Desire and skill achievement
15:30 Need for a positive orientation
19:00 "Voluntary confrontation with emergent anomaly is the best bet." (Art and creativity)
24:00 The Hero's journey is so meta. These stories are timeless.
26:00 "Those who climb the hierarchy with politics and power resent those who are climbing with competence and creativity." 
29:00 Political polarization arises out of a lack of self-knowledge.
35:24 How long will you keep our souls in suspense? John 10:24
36:45 Your self-worth is not rooted in holding the right opinion
40:00 A balance of inquiry and orthodoxy
42:45 We are always on the precipice of a rude awakening
48:00 Limitation is necessary for creativity 
53:00 Need to keep the hierarchy from becoming so steep it's unclimbable
57:30 Media incentivized to broadcast tragedy continually
1:00:00 Positivity sells
18:40  The adversary

We discuss Maps of Meaning and the Great Father in both His benevolent and tyrannical aspects.
Intellectual curiosity, an awareness of one's own worthiness.
Emotional maturity is needed to talk about complex conflicts.
Searching for a way to teach love and wonder which are required to encounter the unknown with a sense that it is benevolent.

The fact of imperfection and our mortality as human beings...
How to avoid hyper political and desiccated speech - requires both orthodoxy and inquiry.

DJ under the moniker Paradox. Ability to hold two opposing ideas in an opening that allows for consideration.

Kendrick LaMar's music:  Power, Poison, Pain and Joy inside my DNA

Communication is rife with difficulties which are infinitely magnified if every idea is automatically tied to an ideology. If you hear someone express an idea, you immediately presume that you know everything else that person thinks. That changes your view of them.

If you can separate the idea out from the person, you can discuss the idea logically, or even with passion if you want, but the discussion doesn't need to break the bond between the people.

Love knows the other - is willing to enter into their world, accept them as the beloved, apart from their ideas. If you don’t do this, when you hear an idea with which you don’t agree, you judge the whole person and they become suspect. Every statement becomes suspect. True communication becomes impossible because now it is contaminated with judgment.

Pushing for conformity of ideology ultimately destroys love and makes diversity impossible.
------------
Your disadvantage is your superpower (overcoming hardship produces greatness) PVK
-------------
The obstacle/anomaly is a gift. KW
The only real natural resource is honesty. JBP
The great Father - tradition, culture, history
Ingratitude tends to see only the tyrannical side of the Father, not the benevolent, creative
And protective side.

The walled city - inside is safe from barbarians and chaos, but then, you are also trapped inside. Without walls, you are destroyed by barbarians. An ordered structure and a certain model of relationship - all of that constitutes the Great Father. 

What lurks behind tyranny is not freedom. It is chaos. Resentful young men are apt to become agents of chaos. 

The benevolent father makes sure the hierarchy doesn’t become so steep as to become unclimbable.
To be on the side of you that wants things to be good for you.
To narrow the influence of evil and to expand the influence of good.
Tell the truth to each other.

What is needed - 
Admirable non-political leaders
Apprenticeship to provide a means of building competence hierarchies of skilled individuals reaching back and lifting others up.
Some youtube entrepreneurs are sharing life skills for free.

JBP
Gratitude and humility
Interest is your future calling you forward.
